trans-unit.target: Fornece um ponto de extremidade de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class uses classes derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> to get the discovery endpoint to use.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> classe usa as classes derivadas de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> para obter o ponto de extremidade de descoberta para usar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider" />.
Obtém o ponto de extremidade de descoberta.
O ponto de extremidade de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider.GetDiscoveryEndpoint%2A> method on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> instance passed by the user to get the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> for discovering the services.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> classe chama o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider.GetDiscoveryEndpoint%2A> método no <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> instância passada pelo usuário para obter o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> para descobrir os serviços.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> also calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider.GetDiscoveryEndpoint%2A> method whenever it must clone itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> também chama <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider.GetDiscoveryEndpoint%2A> sempre que ele deve clone a mesmo.
